member.summary: Gets or sets the video width.

member.summary: Gets or sets the video height.

member.summary: Gets or sets the video bitrate.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is interlaced.

member.name: T:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags
member.summary: Describes properties of the video tags

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.Collection
member.summary: Gets the title of the collection.

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.Season
member.summary: Gets the title of the season.

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.Movie
member.summary: Gets the title of the file for a video file.
member.value: The title of the file for a video file.

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.Actor
member.summary: Gets the real name of actor.

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.ActorCharacter
member.summary: Gets the name of the character an actor or actress plays in this movie.
member.value: The name of the character an actor or actress plays in this movie.

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.WrittenBy
member.summary: Gets the author of the story or script.
member.value: The author of the story or script.

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.ScreenplayBy
member.summary: Gets the author of the screenplay or scenario (used for movies and TV shows).
member.value: The author of the screenplay or scenario (used for movies and TV shows).

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.Director
member.summary: Gets the name of the director.

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.AssistantDirector
member.summary: Gets the name of assistant director.

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.DirectorOfPhotography
member.summary: Gets the name of the director of photography, also known as cinematographer.
member.value: The name of the director of photography, also known as cinematographer.

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.ArtDirector
member.summary: Gets the person who oversees the artists and craftspeople who build the sets.
member.value: The person who oversees the artists and craftspeople who build the sets.

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.Producer
member.summary: Gets the name of producer the movie.
member.value: The name of producer the movie.

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.ExecutiveProducer
member.summary: Gets the name of executive producer.

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.ProductionDesigner
member.summary: Gets the artist responsible for designing the overall visual appearance of a movie.
member.value: The artist responsible for designing the overall visual appearance of a movie.

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.CostumeDesigner
member.summary: Gets the name of the costume designer.
member.value: The name of the costume designer.

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.Choreographer
member.summary: Gets the name of the choreographer.

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.ProductionStudio
member.summary: Gets the name of production studio.

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.WrittenDate
member.summary: Gets the time that the composition of the music/script began.
member.value: The time that the composition of the music/script began.

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.Genre
member.summary: Gets the main genre of the audio or video; e.g. "classical", "ambient-house", "synthpop", "sci-fi", "drama", etc.
member.value: The main genre of the audio or video; e.g. "classical", "ambient-house", "synthpop", "sci-fi", "drama", etc.

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.Mood
member.summary: Gets intended to reflect the mood of the item with a few keywords, e.g. "Romantic", "Sad", "Uplifting", etc.
member.value: Intended to reflect the mood of the item with a few keywords, e.g. "Romantic", "Sad", "Uplifting", etc.

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.EncodedApplication
member.summary: Gets the name of the software package used to create the file, such as "Microsoft WaveEdit."
member.value: The name of the software package used to create the file, such as "Microsoft WaveEdit."

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.EncodedLibrary
member.summary: Gets the software or hardware used to encode this item; e.g. "LAME" or "XviD"
member.value: The software or hardware used to encode this item; e.g. "LAME" or "XviD".

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.EncodedLibrarySettings
member.summary: Gets a list of the settings used for encoding this item. No specific format.
member.value: A list of the settings used for encoding this item. No specific format.

member.name: P:MediaInfo.Model.VideoTags.Summary
member.summary: Gets a plot outline or a summary of the story.
member.value: A plot outline or a summary of the story.
